00036 void ObjOaxConverter::initFrame()
00037 {
00038         // create frame
00039         m_frame = new ObjOaxConverterFrame(0);
00040         m_frame->Show(true);
00041 
00042         // fillFrame
00043         fillFrame();

00046 void ObjOaxConverter::fillFrame()
00047 {
00048         // set frameData
00049         m_frame->setAssemblyData(m_assemblyData);
00050 
00051         // setData
00052         m_frame->setData();
00053 
00054         // get canvas
00055         m_canvas = m_frame->getCanvasPointer();
00056 
00057         // set assembly into canvas
00058         m_canvas->setAssembly(m_assembly);
00059 
00060         // reshape canvas to adjust viewport
00061         m_canvas->reshape();
00062 
00063         // draw the assembly
00064         m_canvas->draw();
00065 
00066         // set categories
00067         m_frame->setAllCategories(m_ptrVec);
00068 }

00070 void ObjOaxConverter::Load(wxString filename)
00071 {
00072         // create ObjectImporter - object
00073         ObjectImport import(filename);
00074 
00075         // get Assembly
00076         m_assembly = import.getAssembly();
00077 
00078         // create new FrameData
00079         m_assemblyData = new AssemblyData();
00080 
00081         // get x - offset and store into frameData
00082         m_assemblyData->m_offsetX = import.getOffsetX();
00083 
00084         // get y - offset and store into frameData
00085         m_assemblyData->m_offsetY = import.getOffsetY();
00086 
00087         // get z - offset and store into frameData
00088         m_assemblyData->m_offsetZ = import.getOffsetZ();
00089 
00090         // tmp list
00091         std::list<wxString> list;
00092 
00093         // temp iterator
00094         std::list<wxString>::iterator it;
00095 
00096         // get FileList
00097         list = import.getFileList();
00098 
00099         // get all files from ObjectImport -> m_listFiles and stor to FrameData -> m_listFiles
00100         for (it = list.begin(); it != list.end(); it++)
00101         {
00102                 m_assemblyData->m_listFiles.push_back(*it);
00103         }
00104 
00105         // set one tag
00106         m_assemblyData->m_tags.push_back(wxT("gnr"));
00107 
00108         // set name
00109         m_assemblyData->m_name = wxString(m_assembly->getName().c_str(), wxConvUTF8);
00110 
00111         // set width
00112         m_assemblyData->m_width = (int)(m_assembly->getWidth() * 1000.0);
00113 
00114         // set depth
00115         m_assemblyData->m_depth = (int)(m_assembly->getDepth() * 1000.0);
00116 
00117         // set heigh
00118         m_assemblyData->m_height = (int)(m_assembly->getHeight() * 1000.0);
00119 }
